column1: Miaulë was the name of Tevildos cook in The Tale of Tinúviel.

column2: described by Christopher Tolkien as "engagingly Elvish-feline" (together with Miaugion and Meoita)
column4: p. 54 is according to Patrick H. Wynne and Christopher Gilson likely cognate with Gnomish miaulin "she-cat".

column1: Category:Characters in The Book of Lost Tales
